paragraph.paragraph: This document contains an index for all of the recorded changes between versions of EiffelEnvision, previously known as Eiffel ENViSioN! (Eiffel for .NET for Visual Studio .NET). The information provided in these pages only provides a quick reference to the changes and enhancements. Please see the url*What's New in EiffelEnvision section of the documentation for a summary of the major changes in this release of EiffelEnvision.
paragraph.heading: 2 Current Edition:
paragraph.paragraph:
eiffelenvision_25.xml EiffelEnvision 2.5 :
The current edition of EiffelEnvision, which this documentation pertains to.
paragraph.heading: 2 Previous Editions:

paragraph.italic: No recorded history for older versions of Eiffel ENViSioN!.
